entry.title: antfu/shikiji
entry.summary:
A syntax highlighter based on TextMate grammars. ESM rewrite of shiki, with more features and capabilities.

Shikiji å¼è¾

An ESM-focused rewrite of shiki, a beautiful syntax highlighter based on TextMate grammars, with more features and capabilities.
